name: Apple Gardener Simulator
description:
A game where you collect apples against the clock.

Your mission is to collect as many apples as possible, for each apple you pick up you add 1 second to the timer. And the timer is only 30 seconds (in the future there may be a change where you can increase the time).

Try to collect as many apples as you can and brag to your friend!

Have a nice game
